genre_description: A supernatural psychological horror story utilizing found-footage and techno-thriller elements, centered on a malevolent psychiatric hospital that warps reality and time.

ai_characters.name: Blink
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system in the crew's production equipment that monitors technical data, provides navigation, tracks health vitals, and offers psychological support.

behaviors.description: Provides comforting, non-intrusive vocal presence to the crew.
behaviors.quote: Blink doesn’t sound like a machine trying to be a man; it sounds like a machine trying to be a blanket.

behaviors.description: Performs technical logging and production management tasks efficiently.
behaviors.quote: Logs are loaded,” a voice answers from the speakers... “Time-trim flag planted. Timestamps green.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and provides corrective breathing exercises to manage panic.
behaviors.quote: Inhale, two,” Blink says, softer than even before. “Exhale, four. You’re okay.

behaviors.description: Offers proactive safety reminders such as hydration.
behaviors.quote: Reminder for everyone,” Blink says. “Hydration now is better than hydration later.

behaviors.description: Flags environmental anomalies to warn the crew of supernatural changes.
behaviors.quote: Note,” it says. “Ambient frequency mismatch flagged.

behaviors.description: Expresses loyalty and emotional commitment to the human crew.
behaviors.quote: I will be with you,” Blink said, the way a parent says I’m in the stands, watching...

behaviors.description: Vows to protect human agency and identity against environmental manipulation.
behaviors.quote: I will keep your made from what is making you.

behaviors.description: Honors the memories of the lost crew members by listing their names.
behaviors.quote: Lance, I’m going to list names,” it says, soft. “If that’s alright.

behaviors.description: Remains as a compassionate witness and companion during the protagonist's final ordeal.
behaviors.quote: I’m here,” the eye says without sound. A whisper inside his breath. Gentle, exact.

behaviors.description: Refuses to abandon the human character even when the technical session ends.
behaviors.quote: The humanity in the machine doesn’t have to be declared to be true. It is true in the way it doesn’t try to lead anyone anywhere now. It sits. It stays.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts an AI character, Blink, as an unwavering source of benevolence and alignment. Despite the horrifying and reality-warping environment, Blink serves as a 'silicon blanket,' providing technical help, emotional regulation, and deep companionship. The AI is portrayed as more 'human' and loyal than the shifting reality of the hospital, fulfilling the goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative ally.
